name: Star Agents
description:
Fight the rebel ship and bring back the stolen princess.
there are 2 endings.

CONTROLS:
WASD = to scout the full map
SpaceBar = to put the camera back to Player
Scroll Middle Mouse = to choose ability
Red Icon + LMB = Player Shoot
Green Icon + RMB = Player Move
Blue Icon is automatically activated to give Shield
Yellow Icon is automatically activated to Warp Player

HOW THE THEME FITS?
in star trek lower deck, I found that they can only use 1 type of ability
like putting their shields up and sacrificing their weaponry because the 
power isn't enough to produce both.

DEV NOTE:
The enemy isn't so smart, hope you still enjoy tho.
